status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Map cities and streets name are now displayed in the language set in the phone settings.

A customer is asking for being able to force names on the map in a certain language, different from the one set in the phone settings.
fields.summary: Set a fixed language for map cities and streets

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress in the past few years. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
